column3: Code review ACK. I think this is exactly right.

Concept ACK

Regression testing is good. Regression testing CVE bugs is great :)

If you have time: please add more CVE regression tests like this :)
ACK. I've also written a fuzz test that can find this issue in less than a week of CPU time: #18521

@practicalswift: Thanks, my plan is indeed to analyze other CVEs as well and see if regression tests can be added (my assumption is that it's unlikely that others can triggered as simple as sending a pair of messages, but anyway it will be an interesting lesson, digging in the history of Bitcoin Core ;-))\n@MarcoFalke: That's interesting, I guess I'm still underestimating how powerful fuzzing can
